name: react-design
description: design your react components on an infinite paper

scripts.browserify: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify src/docs/index.js -t babelify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | terser --compress --mangle > docs/bundle.js
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_PATH=. budo docs/index.js --dir docs --serve bundle.js --open --live --pushstate -- -t babelify
